src:
菲律賓約載60人渡輪翻覆 官方展開救援

07 Nov 2019, 09:44

【新唐人北京時間2019年11月07日訊】菲律賓中部宿霧島（Cebu）附近，7日(週四)一艘載有至少60人的渡輪在洶湧海上翻覆，當局已展開救援行動。
法新社報導，這艘渡輪船員事發時透過無線電求救表示，船隻正在進水。
海岸防衛隊發言人恩希納（Michael Encina）表示，「我們現在沒有統計數字，但我們找到的人都活著，到目前為止我們沒有發現那艘船。」
菲律賓是一個群島國，數以百萬計民眾仰賴不牢固渡輪在群島間進行廉價運輸，船難事故頻傳。
(責任編輯：盧勇信)
本文網址: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102701874.html
text:
The Philippines has about 60 people to overturn the ferry. Official rescue

07 Nov 2019, 09:44

[New Tang Dynasty, Beijing, November 07, 2019] Near the Cebu Island in the central Philippines, a ferry carrying at least 60 people overturned on the sea on the 7th (Thursday). The authorities have launched a rescue operation.
Agence France-Presse reported that the ferry crew was rescued by radio and said that the vessel was entering the water.
Coast Guard spokesperson Michael Encina said, "We don't have statistics yet, but the people we found are alive, so far we haven't found the ship."
The Philippines is an archipelagic country. Millions of people rely on weak ferries to carry out cheap transportation between the islands.
(Editor: Lu Yongxin)
This article URL: https://www.ntdtv.com/b5/2019/11/07/a102701874.html
